text: It was a demon. He imprisoned my mind and tried to ...
The Maw emerges and shut Gudleikur's mouth with a curse.
Adavesa, my darling, are you okay?

I wish I could say that. A lot happened since we last met. Before I got trapped by Gudleikur, I sent my right hand to the dwarfs to craft me an armor, which allows me to go on land. But he never returned. I wished to see you with urgent matters, honestly, but I had no opportunity till now.
It's okay, we can talk now. I'll find your servant don't worry, but until I return, take security measures.
Expect my return in 7 days, till then, Meeth √Åst!
